attributes.action: Halt ratification of the defunct EU treaty, and honour democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rules say all 27 Countries must ratify the treaty, Ireland said "No" as did Holland and France in the past. The vast majority of the People of the UK wanted a vote. There os no democracy within the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
